Items.Title: Resolution concerning an amendment to the District Plan of the Times Square Business Improvement District that provides for a change in the method of assessment upon which the district charge is based, and setting the date, time and place for the public hearing of the local law authorizing a change in the method of assessment upon which the district charge in the Times Square Business Improvement District is based.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
